name: KB Controlled Power Challenge
description: 230 total reps of kettlebell work — no running, no jumping, just controlled power. Start with 50 around-the-body passes, then 60 each of side swings, high pulls, and goblet squats. Based on @metabolicfactor's daily KB routine.

exercises.notes: Drive from the hips, control the arc
Explosive pull to shoulder height, keep bell close

tips: 230 total reps — pace yourself, this is a grind
Break each exercise into sets of 10-15 if needed
Use a moderate weight — you need to survive all 4 exercises
Rest between exercises as needed, but try to keep moving
The passes are your warmup — use them to find your rhythm
